csw.services.ccs

Interface HcdController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    PublisherActor<StateVariable.CurrentState>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractHcdController, AbstractHcdController, HCDExample, JHcdController, JHcdController, TromboneHCD, TromboneHCD

    public interface HcdController
extends PublisherActor<StateVariable.CurrentState>
    Base trait for an HCD controller actor that reacts immediately to SetupConfig messages.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static interface  HcdController.HcdControllerMessage
      Base trait of messages received by HcdController
      static class  HcdController.Submit
      Message to submit a configuration to the HCD

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      scala.PartialFunction<java.lang.Object,scala.runtime.BoxedUnit> controllerReceive()
      This should be used by the implementer actor's receive method.
      void process(Configurations.SetupConfig config)
      A derived class should process the given config and, if oneway is false, either call notifySubscribers() or send a CurrentState message to itself (possibly from a worker actor) to indicate changes in the current HCD state.

      • Methods inherited from interface csw.util.akka.PublisherActor

        notifySubscribers, publisherReceive, requestCurrent, subscribe, subscribers, unsubscribe

    • Method Detail

      • controllerReceive

        scala.PartialFunction<java.lang.Object,scala.runtime.BoxedUnit> controllerReceive()
        This should be used by the implementer actor's receive method. For example: def receive: Receive = controllerReceive orElse ...
        Returns:
        (undocumented)

      • process

        void process(Configurations.SetupConfig config)
        A derived class should process the given config and, if oneway is false, either call notifySubscribers() or send a CurrentState message to itself (possibly from a worker actor) to indicate changes in the current HCD state.

        Parameters:
        config - the config received
